Articles.Content:
Well, as it is, sounds added by mods require custom code to even register they exist, yet before .20 it worked flawlessly without custom code.

Could Squad fix this?

Could this be related to sound issues some of us are having?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/41821-Audio-volume-varies-in-map-mode?highlight=audio

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/41900-Audio-skips-KSP-otherwise-jittery?highlight=audio

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/42261-Audio-Normalizer?highlight=audio

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/42272-Sound-in-Map-View-is-Messed-Up?highlight=sound

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/42281-Audio-bug-in-21-1?p=544021#post544021
Perhaps, but sounds Squad includes, like the thruster running, explosions etc... still work fine, its only mod sounds that fail to initialize.
